ygData.subject: SPOILER: Quest Information Requested
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been doing the Potion of Marr quest found in the Temple of Marr in Freeport. I am on the last sentry, who I find out is shipwrecked somewhere out in the
ygData.messageBody:
I have been doing the Potion of Marr quest found in the Temple of Marr in
Freeport. I am on the last sentry, who I find out is shipwrecked somewhere
out in the Ocean of Tears. Does someone have a location for poor Sentry
Xyrin? A good description of how to find her from the Sisterhood Island
docks or a /loc would be greatly appreciated. I have spent FAR too much time
in a rowboat as it is...

----------------
Celinda Light,
Priestess of Erolissi Marr,
Head Student, Yengtao School
Tarew Marr Server
